File for conducting simulation study is 'MRF_simulation.m'
Results that appear in the paper are in 'simulationresults.mat'
Code for plotting the parameter estimates is 'plot_simulation.m'

File for conducting timing study is 'MRF_timing.m'

File for analyzing data with INLA is 'analyzedata_INLA.R'

File for analyzing data in matlab is 'analyzedata.m'
